import React from 'react' import { iconUrlFromCode } from '../../services/WeatherService' function HourlyForecast({ title, items }) { console.log(items); return (

{TITLE}

{items.map((item) => (

{item.title}

{`${item.temp.toFixed()}°`}

))}
) } export default HourlyForecast {/*

4:30 PM

22°

4:30 PM

22°

4:30 PM

22°

4:30 PM

22°

*/}
